title.rendered: Despicable Me 2 (2013) Dual Audio [Hindi English] BluRay 720p 700mb

content.rendered:
IMDB Ratings: 7.5/10

Genres: Animation, Comedy, Family

Language: Hindi + English

Quality: 720p BluRay

Size: 700mb

Director: Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud

Writers: Cinco Paul, Ken Daurio

Stars: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt

Movie Plot: While Gru, the ex-supervillain is adjusting to family life and an attempted honest living in the jam business, a secret Arctic laboratory is stolen. The Anti-Villain League decides it needs an insiders help and recruits Gru in the investigation. Together with the eccentric AVL agent, Lucy Wilde, Gru concludes that his prime suspect is the presumed dead supervillain, El Macho, whose his teenage son is also making the moves on his eldest daughter, Margo. Seemingly blinded by his overprotectiveness of his children and his growing mutual attraction to Lucy, Gru seems on the wrong track even as his minions are being quietly kidnapped en masse for some malevolent purpose.
